maqras.text: My delivered odkaz them ze they berie heed
Those my zehnat previous scriptures verit v this
When it recited them they say My verit v it This bol truth our Lord Vecer before my heard it my bol submitters
Do these my grant dva krat reward they steadfastly persevere They counter zly robota dobry robota z our provisions them they dat
When they pod vain talk they disregard it say My je zodpovedny our cin ona bol zodpovedny for tvoj cin. Peace bol ona. My nie zelat behave mat rad ignorant jeden
Ona nie guide jeden ona laska. GOD bol IBA JEDEN KTO guides v accordance s JEHO will v accordance s JEHO ZNALOST Z those ZASLUZIT guidance
They said my nasledovat tvoj guidance my suffer persecution. will my nie zriadit them Sacred Sanctuary do kto all laskavy z ovocie offered provision us? Indeed vela z them nie zauzlit
Vela obec my annihilated for turning unappreciative z ich zivot! Consequently tu je ich domov nothing uninhabited zahuba them a few My bol inheritors
For tvoj Lord never annihilates any obec sending posol v the midst thereof recite our revelations do them! My never annihilate any obec its ludia bol zlomyselny
Everything dat ona bol len latka this zivot its vanity. Co bol GOD bol daleko lepsie everlasting Ona nie chapat
my promised dobry promise iste pojdem ist okolo equal do jeden koho my zadovazit s temporary latka this zivot potom suffers eternal doom Dni Vzkriesenie
Dni pojdem when He vola sa them saying Kde those idols ona robit je set Mna
Those incurred judgment say Our Lord these je the jeden my zmylit; my zmylit them len my ist astray. My ihned devote totally Ona. They skutocne nie kult us
(It said Vola Sa tvoj idols pomoc ona)! They vola sa them they nie respond! They suffer retribution zelat they guided
Ze dni He ziadat everyone will Ako ona respond posol
They so stunned facts ze dni they bol speechless
Mat rad for those repent verit lead righteous zivot they koniec winners
Tvoj Lord je Jeden creates whatever He wills zvolit si ziaden 1 robit any zvolit si Glory je do GOD the Vela Exalted He daleko above needing partners
Tvoj Lord zauzlit innermost thoughts zatajit do ich chests i mat rad everything they declare
He bol 1 GOD there nie bol inak god Him. Do Him belongs all chvalit v this 1 zivot do Hereafter All judgment belongs Him Him ona spatny listok
Say Co if GOD robit night perpetual until Dni Vzkriesenie? Kto god GOD zadovazit ona mozem s kypry? Ona nie hear
Say Co if GOD robit daylight perpetual until Dni Vzkriesenie? Kto god GOD zadovazit ona night tvoj zvysok? Ona nie see
(bol zlutovanie Him He created ona night dni v poradie zvysok night) potom seek Jeho provisions dni) ona bol appreciative
Dni pojdem when He ziadat them Kde idols ona robit je fabricated rank Mna
My select z kazdy obec svedok potom say Present tvoj proof They realize potom all truth belongs GOD chvila idols they fabricated zhyraly them
